title: The Echo in the Stone
goal: Kaelen awakens after centuries, disoriented and discovered by a pragmatic young scholar, Lyra, marking his rebirth into a changed world.

beats.summary: Kaelen's consciousness stirs from a profound, ageless slumber, a disorienting haze of ancient memories and forgotten power within a cold, stone sarcophagus.
Lyra, a diligent but cynical acolyte, stumbles upon the long-sealed chamber during a routine archive survey, sensing an unexpected surge of archaic magic.
The sarcophagus opens, revealing Kaelen, whose first, guttural words are an ancient tongue Lyra barely recognizes, sparking her fear and profound curiosity.
Lyra's initial shock gives way to a dawning realization of Kaelen's identity: the legendary Sage of Aethel, thought lost to time.
